docs.text: Table of Contents Home License Release Notes Repository Sitemap Versions What is Google Cloud Storage? Google Cloud Storage is unified object storage for developers and enterprises, from live applications data to cloud archival. What is Google Cloud Storage for Magento 1.x? Google Cloud Storage for Magento 1.x, or MageGCS, is a Magento extension for storing media assets in a Google Cloud Storage bucket.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Home License Release Notes Repository Sitemap Versions
docs.title: Table of Contents

docs.text: Google Cloud Storage is unified object storage for developers and enterprises, from live applications data to cloud archival.
docs.title: What is Google Cloud Storage?

docs.text: Google Cloud Storage for Magento 1.x, or MageGCS, is a Magento extension for storing media assets in a Google Cloud Storage bucket.
docs.title: What is Google Cloud Storage for Magento 1.x?

docs.text: Installation Guide This guide explains how to install Google Cloud Storage for Magento 1.9. Dependencies Google Cloud PHP Autoloader Installing Below are examples of how to install the extension via modman and manually. modman modman init # Only run if you haven't initialized modman yet. modman clone https://github.com/auroraextensions/magegcs.git modman deploy magegcs Manual cd /var/www # Replace /var/www with the Magento root directory. git -C /tmp/ clone https://github.com/auroraextensions/magegcs.git rsync -Pahmvz --stats \ --exclude="package.xml" \ --exclude=".git*" \ --exclude="modman" \ /tmp/magegcs/* ./ rm -rf /tmp/magegcs Wrap Up Before attempting to configure the extension, make sure to clear the configuration cache, and, if any admin sessions are open, log out and log back in.
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: This guide explains how to install Google Cloud Storage for Magento 1.9.

docs.text: Below are examples of how to install the extension via modman and manually.
docs.title: Installing

docs.text: modman init # Only run if you haven't initialized modman yet. modman clone https://github.com/auroraextensions/magegcs.git modman deploy magegcs
docs.title: modman

docs.text: cd /var/www # Replace /var/www with the Magento root directory. git -C /tmp/ clone https://github.com/auroraextensions/magegcs.git rsync -Pahmvz --stats \ --exclude="package.xml" \ --exclude=".git*" \ --exclude="modman" \ /tmp/magegcs/* ./ rm -rf /tmp/magegcs
